characters: A child on the right side of the image, a pedestrian on the left side of the image, a cyclist on the right side of the image, and multiple drivers in vehicles.
summary: The video sequence shows multiple instances of ghost probing behavior. In the first sequence, a child suddenly emerges from behind a parked vehicle on the right side, directly entering the driving lane. In the second sequence, a pedestrian suddenly appears from behind a parked vehicle on the left side, entering the driving lane. In the third sequence, a cyclist emerges from behind a parked vehicle on the right side, entering the driving lane. These instances create immediate collision risks due to the sudden appearance from behind obstructions.
actions: The child, pedestrian, and cyclist all suddenly emerge from behind parked vehicles, creating immediate collision risks.
key_objects: Parked vehicles on both sides of the road, moving vehicles, pedestrians, and cyclists.
